entries.journal_entry_description: Mayor Guh'rantt of Mos Eisley has sent you to veteran marksman, Purvis Arrison.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to Purvis Arrison and aid him against the Tusken Raiders who are attacking Mos Eisley.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Speak with Purvis Arrison about aiding him against the Tusken Raiders who are attacking Mos Eisley.
